OpenMapTreeWindow.Name: Show logical tree
OpenMapTreeWindow.Details: Show the logical tree of the current document.

OpenSelectionDetails.Name: Show selected brush information
OpenSelectionDetails.Details: Show details of the currently selected objects.

PasteSpecial.Name: Paste special...
PasteSpecial.Details: Paste multiple copies with a transformation applied.

TieToEntity.Name: Tie to entity
TieToEntity.Details: Create an entity out of the currently selected objects.
TieToEntity.OneEntitySelectedMessage:
You have selected an existing entity (a '{0}'), how would you like to proceed?
 - Keep the existing entity and add the selected items to the entity
 - Create a new entity and add the selected items to the new entity
TieToEntity.MultipleEntitiesSelectedMessage: You have selected multiple entities, which one would you like to keep?

Carve.Name: Carve
Carve.Details: Carve the selection into any brushes it overlaps. (Use with caution)

Hollow.Name: Make hollow...
Hollow.Details: Make the selected solids hollow. (Use with caution)
Hollow.WarningMessage: This will hollow all {0} solids that are selected.

Transform.Name: Transform...
Transform.ErrorCannotScaleByZeroMessage: Please enter a non-zero value for all axes when scaling.

SnapToGrid.Name: Snap to grid
SnapToGrid.Details: Snap the whole selection to the grid in one piece.

SnapToGridIndividually.Name: Snap to grid individually
SnapToGridIndividually.Details: Snap each selected object to grid as separate objects.

AlignObjectsXMin.Name: Align to X axis minimum
AlignObjectsXMin.Details: Align selected objects to the minimum X value in the selection.

AlignObjectsYMin.Name: Align to Y axis minimum
AlignObjectsYMin.Details: Align selected objects to the minimum Y value in the selection.

AlignObjectsZMin.Name: Align to Z axis minimum
AlignObjectsZMin.Details: Align selected objects to the minimum Z value in the selection.

AlignObjectsXMax.Name: Align to X axis maximum
AlignObjectsXMax.Details: Align selected objects to the maximum X value in the selection.

AlignObjectsYMax.Name: Align to Y axis maximum
AlignObjectsYMax.Details: Align selected objects to the maximum Y value in the selection.

AlignObjectsZMax.Name: Align to Z axis maximum
AlignObjectsZMax.Details: Align selected objects to the maximum Z value in the selection.

FlipSelectionX.Name: Flip on X axis
FlipSelectionX.Details: Flip the selected objects on the X axis.

FlipSelectionY.Name: Flip on Y axis
FlipSelectionY.Details: Flip the selected objects on the Y axis.

FlipSelectionZ.Name: Flip on Z axis
FlipSelectionZ.Details: Flip the selected objects on the Z axis.

ToggleTextureLock.Name: Texture Lock
ToggleTextureLock.Details: Toggle texture locking for uniform operations (transform, rotate).

ToggleTextureScalingLock.Name: Texture Scaling Lock
ToggleTextureScalingLock.Details: Toggle texture locking for scale operations.

LoadPointfile.Name: Load pointfile...
LoadPointfile.Details: Select a pointfile (.lin, .pts) generated by compile tools.

QuickLoadPointfile.Name: Quick load pointfile...
QuickLoadPointfile.Details: Search for a pointfile for this map and load it if one was found.
QuickLoadPointfile.NoPointfileFoundMessage: No pointfile found. Would you like to browse for one?

CenterSelectionAll.Name: Center all views on selection
CenterSelectionAll.Details: Move the cameras of all views to focus on the selected objects.

CenterSelection3D.Name: Center 3D views on selection
CenterSelection3D.Details: Move the cameras of 3D views to focus on the selected objects.

CenterSelection2D.Name: Center 2D views on selection
CenterSelection2D.Details: Move the cameras of 2D views to focus on the selected objects.

GoToObjectID.Name: Go to object ID
GoToObjectID.Details: Select and center views on a specific object ID.
GoToObjectID.Title: Enter ID

GoToLocation.Name: Go to location
GoToLocation.Details: Center views on a specific set of coordinates.
GoToLocation.Title: Enter Coordinates

AutosizeViews.Name: Autosize views
AutosizeViews.Details: Automatically resize the split views to be the same size.

HideSelectedObjects.Name: Hide selected objects
HideSelectedObjects.Details: Hide all objects that are currently selected.

HideUnselectedObjects.Name: Hide unselected objects
HideUnselectedObjects.Details: Hide all objects that are not currently selected.

ShowHiddenObjects.Name: Show hidden objects
ShowHiddenObjects.Details: Show all objects that have been hidden.

ObjectPropertiesDialog.DoYouWantToSaveFirst: There are unsaved changes. Do you want to save them?

PasteSpecialDialog.Title: Paste Special
PasteSpecialDialog.StartAtCenterOfSelection: Start at center of current selection

CompileOutputComponent.Title: Compile
CompileOutputComponent.CompileFailed: Compile failed. Check the message log for more details.

DuplicateFaceIDs.Name: Multiple faces have the same ID
DuplicateFaceIDs.Details: More than one face was found with the same ID. Each face ID should be unique. Fixing this problem will assign the duplicated faces a new ID.

DuplicateKeyValues.Name: Entity has duplicate keys
DuplicateKeyValues.Details: This entity has the same key specified multiple times. Fixing the problem will delete the duplicate keys.

DuplicateObjectIDs.Name: Multiple objects have the same ID
DuplicateObjectIDs.Details: More than one object has the same ID. Each object ID should be unique. Fixing the problem will assign the duplicates new IDs.

GameDataNotFound.Name: Entity class not found
GameDataNotFound.Details: This entity class was not found in the current game data. Ensure that the correct FGDs are loaded.

GroupWithoutChildren.Name: Group has no children
GroupWithoutChildren.Details: This group is empty. A group must have contents. Fixing the problem will delete the group.

InvalidSolid.Name: Invalid solid
InvalidSolid.Details: This solid is invalid. It is either not convex, has coplanar faces, or has off-plane vertices. Fixing the issue will delete the solid.

NoPlayerStart.Name: This document has no player start
NoPlayerStart.Details: There is no info_player_start entity in this document. The player will spawn at the origin instead. This may place the player inside geometry or in the void. Fixing the issue will place a player start entity at the document origin. It is recommended that you fix this problem manually.

TextureAxisPerpendicularToFace.Name: Texture axis perpendicular to face
TextureAxisPerpendicularToFace.Details: The texture axis of this face is perpendicular to the face plane. This occurs when manipulating objects with texture lock off, as well as various other operations. Re-align the texture to the face to repair. Fixing the problem will reset the textures to the face plane.
